thread.title: Nova Orman Ürünleri invests in thermal modification chamber
thread.title_full: Nova Orman Ürünleri invests in thermal modification chamber

author: Lesprom Network
title: Nova Orman Ürünleri invests in thermal modification chamber
text:
Jartek Invest Oy has signed a contract with Nova Orman Ürünleri San. Tic. A.S. of Türkiye for the technology delivery of a thermal modification chamber with a capacity of 30,000 m³/a.
The delivery includes a state-of-the-art chamber using ThermoWood technology. This system features Jartek’s latest thermal modification technology, offering precise temperature control, optimized energy consumption, and automated process management. The delivery is scheduled for completion in June.
“As one of the largest wood thermal modification facilities in the world, Novawood continues to expand its capacity with the new chamber in Türkiye. Jartek was selected for this expansion due to its proven reliability and leadership in advanced thermal modification technology, ensuring high-quality and efficient production,” says Göksel Yildiz, General Manager of Nova Orman Ürünleri, on why they chose Jartek for this investment.
Nova Orman Ürünleri San. Tic. A.S. is a prominent producer of high-quality ThermoWood products. Their range includes decking, cladding, and wood applications for both interior and exterior use.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->manufacturing and engineering
